thread.section_title: Hotel Galileo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel in excellent position
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel in excellent position - Review of Hotel Galileo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrea W
title: Lovely hotel in excellent position
text:
Great communication from the hotel before our stay, offering help with everything from airport pickups to suggestions for tourist attractions and dining options.
Easy to find from the Metro, just a short walk along the Champs Elysees. Great welcome from the concierge Christopher, with the offer of coffee or tea in the comfortable reception area.
Room was small but perfectly formed. Very clean with tea/coffee making facilities. Area was very quiet when we were there.
Great recommendations for dinner options, though no restaurant in the hotel. Breakfast was served in the small area downstairs, and was good.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, and would certainly consider staying again - they can offer adjoining rooms for if you are travelling with family.
